panels.description: Periodically (every 5000ms) a background process sampler samples which processes are running and captures the message_queue_len
panels.title: Message Queue

targets.expr: scalar(allocator{instance=~"$node", section="mbcs", metric="binary_block_size"}) / scalar(allocator{instance=~"$node", section="mbcs", metric="binary_carrier_size"})
scalar(allocator{instance=~"$node", section="sbcs", metric="binary_block_size"}) / scalar(allocator{instance=~"$node", section="sbcs", metric="binary_carrier_size"})

panels.title: Total inbound requests (average latency in seconds)

targets.expr:
(sum by(http_method, route) (rate(cowboy_request_duration_seconds_sum{instance="$node", status_class="success"}[5m]))) /
(sum by(http_method, route) (rate(cowboy_request_duration_seconds_count{instance="$node", status_class="success"}[5m])))

panels.title: Successful inbound requests (average latency in seconds)

targets.expr:
(sum by(http_method, route) (rate(cowboy_request_duration_seconds_sum{instance="$node", status_class!="success"}[5m]))) /
(sum by(http_method, route) (rate(cowboy_request_duration_seconds_count{instance="$node", status_class!="success"}[5m])))

panels.title: Failed inbound requests (average latency in seconds)
Total inbound requests (total latency in seconds)
Successful inbound requests (total latency in seconds)
Failed inbound requests (total latency in seconds)

targets.expr: sum by(route, http_method) (rate(ar_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{instance="$node"}[5m])) / sum by(route, http_method) (rate(ar_http_request_duration_seconds_count{instance="$node"}[5m]))

panels.title: Total Outbound Requests (average latency in seconds)

targets.expr: sum by(route, http_method) (rate(ar_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{instance="$node", status_class="success"}[5m])) / sum by(route, http_method) (rate(ar_http_request_duration_seconds_count{instance="$node", status_class="success"}[2m]))

sum by(route, http_method, status_class) (rate(ar_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{instance="$node", status_class!="success"}[5m])) / sum by(route, http_method, status_class) (rate(ar_http_request_duration_seconds_count{instance="$node", status_class!="success"}[5m]))

panels.title: Total Outbound Requests (total latency in seconds)
